page.title: 08GORING & STREATLEY GOLF CLUB
page.content: Goring and Streatley{Golf Club} was started in 1890. There is only about 45cms of top soil with flints and chalk below. As it is chalk the soil drains well. Now the{golf club}is about 150 acres and there are 740 members. The youngest members are children aged 10 and the oldest members are 82. The joining fee is around Â£400 and there is an annual subscription of Â£206.75. Every morning men come to mow and fertilize the grass. There are 18 labourers who use 2 tractors and 3 mowing machines costing about Â£11000 each.The club is open all year round except when there are floods or the ground is covered with ice and snow.{ { {
